content.raw:
I think @caguero is probably the most qualified to address this question.

Since we should be migrated to the use of imported targets and this find-module is only being used internally, backwards compatibility shouldn't be an issue. I think it should be totally safe to remove these lines, but first I want to double-check with someone who would know.
